meanings.definition: The process of taking an X-ray of a vein after injecting a contrast medium.
meanings.sent1: During the venography, the doctor injected a special dye into my vein.
meanings.sent2: The venography revealed a blockage in the vein.
meanings.sent3: The venography showed my vein wearing a tiny superhero cape!
meanings.sent4: Her veins lit up on the venography like a map of glowing rivers.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the image of my vein on the venography.

meanings.definition: The diagnostic procedure used to visualize veins in the body.
meanings.sent1: After the venography, the doctor could see all the veins clearly.
meanings.sent2: The venography helped identify the varicose veins in her leg.
meanings.sent3: The venography made the veins look like a tangled web of spaghetti!
meanings.sent4: His veins appeared like intricate patterns on the venography.
meanings.sent5: The venography provided a detailed map of the veins in her body.
